channel.title: Err ummm
channel.description:
So why is it everytime I play single player, I don't lag the slightest, but when I log into Moparcraft at the postion x: -211 and z: 156 or whatever the coord it, I just lag. And can't move or anything. But in single playing I can full on fly, and do everything, and that, use all these pistons, switches, redstone. Not lag, and just login to Moparcraft, and just lag. Like no other. >_<
When at the /login screen at spawn, I wont lag either, till after I log in. Then I just lag... :/
It's sad when I can't even seem to drown fast enough in the water... v.v
SOMEONE HELP ME! xD

item.title: Err ummm
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

sorry guys it’s my chicken farm, you’ll lag pretty badly if you go near it. i’m trying to get them to the surface and release them into the wild so everyone else can enjoy the chickeny goodness.

edit: so I think the chickens have either escaped or died? no more lag?!

Read full topic

item.title: Err ummm
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

Very possibly that redstone circuits or something is causing server leaks in those areas. I remember an automatic train station lagged the server because it had minecarts moving all the time.

Read full topic

item.title: Err ummm
item.dc:creator: @Demon6994 Demon6994
item.description:
@Demon6994 wrote:

:o[quote=“noobs are ftw, post:3, topic:418437”][quote author=badger41 link=topic=520981.msg3785028#msg3785028 date=1318793526]
might be the networking thats lagging you?

idk try to get optifine or w.e its called

EDIT: Actually no theres something in the world thats doing it, i can be in my village and not lag, but if i start going close to magma’s place my fps drops to like 10, and not bc of my computer my normal fps is 150 - 200
[/quote]

proof its not just you is that i tested aswell[/quote]

So i’m not just lagging there? Everyone else that goes there lags too. So does this mean someone that was there, has something there that is causing a lag?

So since I can’t even seem to to drown myself without running out of memory, I would have to be teleported or even killed, which you can’t do since I am lagged so badly.

Read full topic
